professional_summary: Creative full-stack developer with 4+ years experience building modern web applications. Passionate about user experience, performance optimization, and clean architecture. Experienced in both frontend and backend development with a focus on scalable solutions.

summary: Built responsive web applications using React and Node.js

Collaborated with design team to improve user experience
Developed interactive user interfaces with React and Vue.js
Integrated REST APIs and managed application state
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness
Focus on Web Development and Database Systems
